TopicTitle: Fully scan all planets and moons with SCANSAT

Articles.Content:
Rules:

  1. No cheating, kraken drives, overclock, hyperedit, etc.
  2. IRSU's/drills allowed
  3. Must use SCANSAT to scan all moons and planets fully, Lo, Hi, Multi, Vis Lo, Vis Hi, Anomaly, Res Lo, Res Hi must be 100%
  4. Decoding: Lo - Altimetry low, Hi - Altimetry High, Multi - Biome, Vis Lo/Hi - Visual Low/High, Res Lo/Hi - Resource Low/High
  5. Stock resource scan not required
  6. Only 1 ship can leave planet SOI. You can leave stuff anywhere you like, as long as you are not gonna use it anymore (AKA debris)
  7. Least mass wins
  8. Information/Autopilot/Visual mods allowed. Stock parts
  9. Any settings you like except DSN must be normal-level
  10. Anything else?
Edited February 17, 2023 by Leo-MathGuy
